ferrothorn:LeechSeedPower.NAME: Leech Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: HP at the end of each turn. NL On death, Heal #b

ferrothorn:Scales.NAME: Scales
DESCRIPTIONS: After receiving all #yAttacks from an enemy, deals #b

ferrothorn:Stamina.NAME: Stamina
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next card that grants you #yBlock grants you an additional #b

ferrothorn:StockpilePower.NAME: Stockpile
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yStamina equal to the damage blocked.

ferrothorn:RegenFerrothornPower.NAME: Regen
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, heal #b

ferrothorn:SpotlightPower.NAME: Spotlight
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, a random enemy immediately attacks you for #b0 damage

ferrothorn:CounterPower.NAME: Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack you receive is fully blocked, deal
that much back to the attacker
